title: What Fills the Whitespace: 10 Surprising Lessons from Writing a Book
abstract: Writing a book is no small feat, especially when it revolves around rapidly-evolving technology. In this intimate session, delve deep into the hidden intricacies, challenges, and personal revelations experienced on Matt Goldman’s journey of writing .NET MAUI in Action. 📖
description:
​Writing a book is no small feat, especially when it revolves around rapidly-evolving technology. In this intimate session, delve deep into the hidden intricacies, challenges, and personal revelations experienced on Matt Goldman's journey of writing .NET MAUI in Action. 📖

Beyond the printed words lies a vast hidden realm of determination, discipline, feedback, emotional roller-coasters, and unexpected hurdles. Balancing a full-time job, personal commitments, and the continuous evolution of the technology, the process of writing isn't merely about churning out chapters. It's a deeply personal voyage, with lessons that transcend beyond the subject matter of the book itself. 🧠🔄️
 
Join Matt as he offers valuable insights into the unseen challenges and rewards that punctuate a book author's journey. Dive into the whitespace and emerge with newfound respect, inspiration, and understanding of the world of book writing. 💡
\--

Join us in person from 6 pm AEST in Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane:
SSW Sydney – Live 🔴
SSW Melbourne – Watch party 🎦
SSW Brisbane – Watch party 🎦
